transArray.content: Rich breakfast and clean location. There are also free parking spaces. The service is very good. There are also oranges at the front desk. It is a hotel worth recommending. I will stay here again on my next business trip.

Dear guest, thank you very much for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and for your comprehensive recognition and sharing. The smile on your lips is our greatest encouragement. We will continue to work hard to provide you with a more comfortable and convenient stay. Environment, all hotel staff look forward to your every visit and wish you all the best
